title: MAHATRANSCO Recruitment 2025 - Apply Online for 20 Electrician Posts
description: Maharashtra State Electricity Transmission Company (MAHATRANSCO) has declared the official notification for 2025. To fill up the vacancies for 20 Electrician Jobs. Those candidates who have qualified in the 10th Pass, ITI can grab this chance and apply for these posts. Here, we include the age limit, selection process, salary structure, education details, application fee, and how to apply for the MAHATRANSCO Recruitment 2025. Interested and eligible candidates can apply online through the web...
